nodes.text: Cavern's Delight was a ride that was located in Aucellis Park, an entertainment park that operated on the moon Keriba VI during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The park was secretly an Imperial re-education facility that manipulated the minds of visitors, and Cavern's Delight served as the entrance to an underground re-education center. The ride itself was a thrill ride, where riders were propelled through a series of caverns on hovercars.
